intro: My research centers on understanding the dynamics of collective attention in complex digital ecosystems. I use computational methods, data science, and network analysis to investigate:

areas.title: AI in Journalism & Media
areas.description: How artificial intelligence reshapes newsroom workflows, editorial judgment, and audience relationships.

areas.title: Information Discovery & Virality
areas.description: Why certain stories surface, how they spread across platforms, and what pulls collective focus.

areas.title: Platform Dynamics
areas.description: The structures, incentives, and politics of the attention markets that route news and culture.

areas.title: Computational Methods for Social Science
areas.description: New datasets and tooling for studying media, algorithms, and online publics at scale.
